column1: good morning, Mr Stanlake. Starts with a nice, juicy leg-stump half-volley that has been flicked neatly to the square leg boundary. Easy
slants a length ball across the left-hander, left alone
slash and a miss. Beaten for pace, extra bounce as well that time for big Billy
ripper of a bouncer, late on the pull. Got big on him as well.
looks to pull this into the bleachers, misses. Pace from Stanlake again
too much width this time, Fakhar has blasted that through cover and point. Cracking stroke!

chips this straight to square leg. Soft dismissal, Haris' poor run continues. This is a length ball that bounces a touch more than the batsman expects, closed the bat face early, hit this off the top part of the bat and ended up spooning a dolly.
skiddy back of length delivery across the left-hander, left alone
gentle little dab off an angled bat past the slips for an easy single.
lofted, but not well timed. Just short of mid-on
back of length on middle and leg, clipped to long leg
backs away to loft over the bowler's head, but no timing as he gets this off a thick inside edge. Rolls back down the pitch
imperious! Picks the length early, swivels and pulls over square leg. Lovely use of his wrists to pick the gap.
savage blow, this time in front of square. Disdainfully slapped through midwicket. Once again Stanlake pays the price for being too short.
cracking stroke, belted on the bounce over the point fielder. Hit that hard into the turf, so the fielder at the edge of the ring stood no chance. Too much width this time
clears his front leg and wallops this length ball to deep square leg this time
backs away to upper cut but is beaten for pace
squeezes this drive straight to backward point.
too much leg side. Too short, he rolls his wrists over the pull to pick this behind square. Raced away
makes room, bowler follows him with the short ball on the body, tucked into the leg side as they scamper a run
pulled, not in control but he'll still get four. Mid-on is just escorting that to the fence.
whips this to fine leg. Stanlake took ages to run in and bend down to the ball, excellent running
steep bouncer, shaped to pull but let it go. Wide for bounce.
slides this down leg, Carey doesn't stop it cleanly either.
looks to whip this behind square, misses. Angle was taking it way down leg, wide again.
pulled, but there's protection at deep square leg, down to just a single.
pulled to the square leg region again for another single
gets on top of the bounce and helps this along to square third man.
cut away but straight to point
swung away but not cleanly, off a thick inside edge to deep midwicket
slower and fuller on off stump, squeezed to the cover region
dropped at mid-off! Stoinis was a little late to move. Talat looked to flat bat this over the bowler's head, but got it high on the bat.
steered down to third man as they jog the single
sliced into the gap between cover and point. Not convincing, he wanted to go over long-off, but will take the runs anyway.
works this length ball on middle and leg towards square leg
back of length angling away, he makes room and slaps this straight to cover point.
works this length ball on middle and leg towards midwicket
beaten! Nibbles away, he looks to run it down but done in my minute deviation as it passed the bat
steps out to swing leg side, ends up slicing it over cover point, bounces away but not enough legs to cross the ropes. Pulled back.
dabs this gently into the off side, behind square, for a quick single.
inside-edges a premeditated reverse sweep to short third man
cuts, but can't find the gap. Straight to point
rocks back and pulls this shortish delivery towards deep midwicket
too short, punished. Enough time to open up the leg side and hammer this into the gap at wide long-on
goes right back into the crease and defends.
squeezes this full yorker-length delivery back to the bowler
steps out and belts this back on the bounce to Agar
swept towards deep backward square leg, Tye can't get there.
huge, huge! This is stunning batting. Picked his slot, got to the pitch and swung this with the spin and breeze, cleared the ropes comfortably. They aren't small boundaries, mind you
swung away, deep midwicket and long-on converge to keep that to two
fired flat on middle and leg, tucked towards square leg
works this into the leg side as they scamper a single
shapes to cut, but gets a thick outside edge, Carey can't grab that tough chance which he deflects to short third man
makes room and eases this wide of point
striking right out of the top drawer. Stepped out, didn't get to the pitch but had the guts to hit through the line and loft inside-out over the cover boundary
steps out and blocks this full and fast delivery
beaten by one that slides in, cramps him for room and crashes into the stumps. Completely misread the line as he looked to cut. Good innings nonetheless from Talat
beauty! Angling away but too close to the off stump channel, looks to run it down but is beaten
jags away off a length to square him up as this whizzes past that tentative push
pulled, all along the ground to deep square leg
excellent short ball, Sarfraz ducks under this. Called one for the over for height.
gets half a stride in and guides this length delivery to point
bunts this into the off side, too close to the fielders to attempt a run
steps out and smashes the cover off this, excellent stop by Agar at extra cover, just a half-stop mind you but he took the pace off to save three runs
swept nicely to the square leg boundary. Did so with the spin, got just a touch outside the line to allow the stroke.
tucks this wide of short fine leg for an easy single
clobbered deep into the stands at deep midwicket, out onto the roof. That is the shortest boundary at the ground, fifty for Fakhar. Super knock.
drills this down to long-on
dabs this slider towards point for a quick single
steep bouncer, Sarfraz hustled for pace as he hops back to fend. Took the bottom glove off the bat as he faced that
driven into the gap at cover, check drive but timed nicely.
has he got the edge? No. Beauty. Squared up. Angled in, and left him late as Sarfraz poked.
steered, Maxwell puts out his right hand at point to stop that. Was travelling
muscled over deep midwicket. Picked the length, his spot and just applied all his might in swatting that away
excellent bouncer that whizzes past his helmet as he avoids.
beaten as he looks to back away and crash this over point
drilled down to long-on, who scoops it to long-off, can't prevent the second though
backs away and flat-bats this length ball to long off
shapes to pull but has to fetch it from way outside off, bails out.
thick outside edge to this legcutter which he looks to loft over cover, Carey accepts the simple offering.
eases this full delivery down to long-on to get off the mark immediately
this is a typical Fakhar special. This is length on leg stump, he stays inside the crease and just whips it over deep backward square leg with minimal feet movement.
bunts this to cover, looks for a single, but sent back
rocks back and cuts to deep point, misfield by Darcy Short means they get another.
smashed straight into the sightscreen. Steps out, gets underneath the flight and times this magnificently.
whips this to midwicket
too short, he helps this on its way to the deep backward square leg boundary. Walked across to pick his spot and when the ball arrived, just signed it with love and sent it on its way
steps out and works this down to long on
looks to swing over long-on but gets a thick outside edge that bounces towards the third man boundary. The fielder there tried to stop, but ended up parrying it over the ropes.
the party is over, he can only toe-end this pull as far as the edge of the ring at midwicket. Went for a biff across the line, ended up having to fetch it from too far outside.
steers this short of length delivery down to square third man
right behind the line of this length delivery as he defends.
ducks under this short ball on middle and leg, one called for the over for height.
slashed away towards square third man, Big Stanlake is there.
slaps this length delivery back past the bowler, hit straight and really hard.
swing and a miss. Looked to make room and slap this through cover.

pulled, but safe. Long-on was running in, midwicket was running sideways, and this fell right between both of them. Asif still had to dive full stretch to get back in time, as the fielder threw to the bowler, who fired a rocket throw to Carey in the hope of a run out
slices this attempted hoick over midwicket to third man on the bounce
reaches out to this wide delivery and steers this straight to point
toe-ends a slog past midwicket, they scamper back for the second as Finch, running back, took a while to get across.
backs away and steers this to backward point for a quick single
stunning! Too full and angling in, Malik makes room, exposes all three stumps, but calmly lofts this cleanly on the bounce to the long-off boundary
backs away to go over point, Stoinis follows him and cramps him for room, beaten.
sliced over backward point, bounces into the third man fence. Wonder if he deliberately opened the face of the bat, yes he did, as replays confirm.

this time he wallops this between cover and point. Makes hell lot of room, bowler follows him but Malik somehow manages to open up more space and use the width to flat bat this up and over in front of square. Magnificent
wide yorker, reaches out to squeeze this but can't lay bat to it. Clever from Stoinis
full toss, swung away on the bounce to long-on
this is a waist-high full toss or just below at max, swung away but no control over the stroke, plonks in front of the man coming in from deep midwicket
squeezes this yorker length delivery to long-on
lofted, but straight to cover. No power, tried to hit it too hard, got it off the bottom. The length did the trick, blockhole almost, Malik almost had to dig it out.
whips this full delivery down to wide long-on
leg-stump yorker which he looks to flick but misses, may have clipped the pad on the way.
swing and a miss, deceived by the slower one
backs away, opens the bat face and slices this full delivery over backward point, excellent improvisation
cracking hit. Backs away, gets underneath the length and clobbers this inside-out, one bounce to the deep cover fence.
slower bouncer, he shaped to pull in front of square but then held his shape for split second and instead helped this up and over short fine. Clever
toe-ends a lofted hit on the bounce to long-off
whips this down to long-on

this has been clobbered straight to Maxwell at long-off, he was a few yards in, this was struck fiercely. He needed some leeway there, in case he overbalanced in trying to take this, but he made it look very easy. Went along with the momentum, took a couple of steps back after taking the catch before steadying himself to release the ball.
sliced to deep point, they think of the second, don't take

hit hard, hit straight and out of the ground. Too full on middle from wide of the crease, he made room, swung through like a golfer. Tremendous strike. Onto the roof and out of the ground. Held his pose nicely for the shutterbugs afterwards
driven towards extra cover for an easy single
walks across and whips this full toss on middle over the fine leg boundary. Used the pace and scooped it away nonchalantly
pulled but can't clear long-on this time, Maxwell does well to move swiftly to his left, moves low and takes this inches from the ground.
squeezes this off a thick inside edge to the fine leg boundary to end the innings. On another day, this would've crashed into the leg stump.
straightens after angling in from wide of the crease, nice shape. defended.
width outside off, he glides this down to third man where the fielder lets it through his legs, boundary when it should've just been one The fielder? 18-year old Shaheen Afridi
eases this length ball to point
full on off, hint of shape away, he gets a good stride in and defends
punches this incoming length delivery wide of mid-on for a quick single
stands tall and punches this length delivery on the up to point
slash and a miss. There was width, but he played through too early.
steers this length delivery to square third man
stands tall and punches back, the bowler does well to put his right hand out on the followthrough to stop that
clean strike, one bounce over long-off. Stood his ground and lofted this length ball through the line
works this off his hip towards the man coming in from deep square, lazy fielding, alert running
straighter and more classier. One bounce to the long-off boundary. This was right in the slot, Finch got to the pitch and belted this away.
works this off his hip to deep square leg
whips this length ball on middle towards square leg, looks like there was a thick inside edge.
pacy, late swing as well. Beaten. The movement meant he had to cover for the swing, Short didn't move his feet an inch this time as he wafted at it. Beaten
works this off his pads but can't pick the gap, straight to midwicket
hops back and punches this into the covers for a quick single
slower length ball on middle and leg, he tucks this into the leg side for a quick single
whips this off his hip to deep square, one bounce to the fielder.
makes room to go over the off side, the bowler follows him. Finch bunts this past the bowler as they jog the single.
looks to slap this over the bowler's head but gets it high on the bat, just eludes the bowler on his followthrough, rolls to mid-on
hits the deck hard, gets some extra bounce off the deck, defended into the leg side
pulled but no control, hit off the top part, on the bounce to square leg.
hammered on the up, but can't pierce the packed off side ring, straight to extra cover
steps out and carves him over cover point. Lovely touch, lovely timing. Young man put under pressure immediately

has he got him? Yes. Afridi leaps in celebration, Finch gets a thick inside edge on the way through to Sarfraz. He was looking to punch this away but the ball deviated a long way back in off the seam to cut him into two halves.
smashed to the point boundary. Too short, sitting up nicely to be cracked. He used the width nicely
hops back and tucks this short of length delivery off his hip to square leg
defended nicely with soft hands to the off side as they scamper a run
tucked off his hip into the gap at midwicket
off the thigh pad into the leg side, wanted to tickle it fine. Given runs though
the middle stump has been uprooted. What a sight for any fast bowler. Head looks to force this down the ground but plays outside the line of one that just nips away from length on leg to hit middle.
right behind the line of this length ball as he defends
just eludes midwicket. Uppishly whipped by Maxwell., in the air because he jabbed at this.
clipped nicely to the fine leg boundary. Lovely use of his wrists. Hopped back and then used the angle of this length ball on leg to put that away
beaten as he looks to flay this on the up over cover
bunted back past the bowler, towards mid-on
walked across just a touch to pull, didn't have room so he adjusted well and whipped this behind square to the fine leg boundary
beauty! Cut him into two halves again. Maxwell is uncertain as he pushes at a length ball that holds its line. Bites off the deck as well to whizz past the inside edge
works this off the pad to midwicket
full, straight and gone. First he gets Finch, now Maxwell. Late inswing has done the trick. Maxwell looks to flick, misses and is trapped plumb in front. Shaheen Shah Afridi on fire
swings away from outside off, left alone
on the pads, nicely worked away in front of square towards deep midwicket
works this with the spin to long-on
turns this gently to deep square
drifts away to beat him on the cut, no turn but he played for some
slider, defended to cover. Once again no turn.
keeps low, he hops back and defends.
lunges out and drives through the line to sweeper cover
makes room and punches wide of cover
works this off middle and leg to midwicket, excellent work from Asif Ali. Moving swiftly to his left and then putting out a dive to save two
flicked but straight to midwicket again
hint of width, stands tall and punches to sweeper cover.
backs away and slaps this back past the bowler to mid-off, failing to get the big hits. Good, tight bowling.
walks across to flick, the ball angles in and deflects off the thigh pad to square leg
sliced but safe, over point. Wanted to go over cover, but the ball drifted away to take the edge.
in the air again, but eludes the cover fielder who runs back to try and catch. They sneak a second.
hit hard and flat, straight to sweeper cover
makes room and punches wide of sweeper cover
punched back, uppishly but wide of Shadab, down to long-on

wonderful bowling, Maddinson runs down the pitch without having a little clue about this googly that spuns past the face of the bat, Sarfraz completes a straightforward stumping. Australia sink further.
hit hard into the ground at cover as they scamper a run
back of length delivery angling away, he shoulders arms
thick outside edge as he looks to flay this on the up, down to third man
steps out and slaps this pull to deep midwicket
stands tall and bunts this short of length delivery to the covers.
pulled, not timed well, straight to midwicket.
driven straight to cover.
too short, he makes room and cuts but straight to point
googly, wild swing, thick inside edge to deep square leg
slides away from length on off, looks to cut but is beaten.
gentle little dab on this slider to short third man
works this with the spin to square leg, quick single taken.
floated full and across, driven down past the bowler for a single

the leg stump has been flattened and Afridi takes off on his celebration. Short's misery is over. Full, straight and honing in towards the stumps from wide of the crease, he went for a massive hit over long-on, couldn't connect to anything but air. Third wicket for Afridi.
looks to flick but the ball sneaks off the pad to square leg
hoicked to the midwicket boundary, not off the middle but you only need it to trickle away to get the runs anyway.
yorker length on middle and off, worked towards long-on. Lazy effort by Haris Sohail, Sarfraz lets him know
too short, he swivelled back and pulled this short ball all along to the square leg boundary
sweeps this full toss on middle and leg to the deep backward square leg boundary
scoops this googly over the infield, down to wide long-off
powerful slog sweep, deep into the stands at cow corner. Too full, he got underneath the flight, most importantly, read the legspin and muscled that away
looks to reverse sweep one that drifts away, misses.
walks across to scoop, hit on the body.
doesn't read the googly, goes for another expansive sweep, misses.
hops back and punches this length ball to deep point
walks across to pull but misses.
sparkling hit! This is a short-arm jab off a length delivery, sails over wide long-on, tremendous hand-eye coordination
whips this length ball on middle and leg to deep square
slash and a miss. Didn't have to width to smash that through.
no timing, so he ends up hoicking this length ball straight to deep midwicket. Australia unravelling very quickly.
length angling in, defended.
another ugly hoick, lands short of Fakhar coming in from long-on
drilled down to long-on, flat and straight to the fielder.
walks across, looking to use the pace and flick behind square but misses. The ball thuds into flap of the pad, and they scoot for a leg bye
not much timing as he bunts this low full toss down to long-off.
shades of Yuvraj Singh! This is a delicious half-volley on the pads and he flicks this nonchalantly to clear deep midwicket. Lovely wrist work.
backs away and carves this through cover, misfield means what should've been no more than single is now four.
full toss angling down, swing and a miss, wide.
mistimes a slog down past the bowler to long-on
slices this up and over point, cramped for room
right into the blockhole, he makes room and squeezes this drive to deep cover.
inside edges a full delivery that he wants to hit back straight to long-on
makes room and lofts this inside out to deep point on the bounce.
driven hard, but can't pick the gap. Straight to sweeper cover
works this off a thick inside edge, into the gap at deep midwicket
swing and a miss. Down on one knee to loft this over cover, beaten for pace
looks to scoop. but cops a blow on the body off the toe-end, nothing serious. He scampers across for a run
walks across to expose middle and leg, the yorker tails in exactly there to beat the swing and crash into the stumps. That's an Amir special!
squeezes out this full delivery, down to long-on to get off the mark
whips this full toss into the vacant spaces at deep midwicket
looks to hoick this over square leg, played too early, ball deflects off the thigh pad into the leg side
pulled in front of square, straight to deep midwicket
full toss on middle, he looks to swing this over long-on but doesn't get enough bat on it, rolls to the fielder instead
slower length ball, he looks to force this through cover, but the ball rolls back past the bowler off an inside edge

swirler, went a mile in the air. Sarfraz was circling under it but couldn't get a glove on it. This was a very very tough chance against the grey skies. He looked to hoick this behind square, the ball went off the top edge.
full and angling down, flicks pad on the way to the keeper
muscled over cow corner. Banged in short, he got into position quickly and pulled him imperiously
off a thick inside edge to this hoick, down to deep midwicket
squeezes out this yorker to long-on
chops this cut, on the bounce to the keeper.
makes room and squeezes the drive to mid-off
